verses.name: Joshua 14:7
verses.text: Forty years old was I when Moses the servant of the Lord sent me from Kadesh–barnea to espy out the land; and I brought him word again as it was in mine heart.

verses.name: Joshua 14:8
verses.text: Nevertheless my brethren that went up with me made the heart of the people melt: but I wholly followed the Lord my God.

verses.name: Joshua 14:9
verses.text: And Moses sware on that day, saying, Surely the land whereon thy feet have trodden shall be thine inheritance, and thy children’s for ever, because thou hast wholly followed the Lord my God.
